backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, leadership word submissions with counts, and resilient leadership activities with access-control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style summary list describing the purpose of each major frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH‑based theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining router routes, query client, and page structure using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing navigation, header, mobile menu, and Internet Identity auth controls.
frontend/src/components/HeroBanner.tsx: Reusable hero banner component rendering a background image with title and optional subtitle.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipWordPa: Fetches and displays top leadership word counts with loading and empty states using a bar-style visualization.
frontend/src/components/MicroSolutionsCo: Displays community micro‑solutions grouped by challenge type with loading and empty states, supporting optional polling.
frontend/src/components/PageSection.tsx: Simple layout wrapper that adds responsive padding and max‑width styling around section content.
frontend/src/components/SignInGate.tsx: Gates content behind Internet Identity authentication, showing loading and sign‑in prompts when needed.
frontend/src/content/movieReferences.ts: Exports a list of formatted movie and film‑series citations used in activities and reference pages.
frontend/src/content/proposalContent.ts: Defines structured proposal metadata and text content, including title, abstracts, and learning outcomes.
frontend/src/content/references.ts: Provides a typed list of academic references with stable keys for display and citation usage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and submitting user profiles, leadership words, and resilient leadership activities with cache updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitiesPage.tsx: Renders an overview page linking to Activity 1 and Activity 2 with descriptions and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/Activity1LeadershipWo: Implements Activity 1 form handling, submission, affirmation generation, and quote retrieval with validation and error states.
frontend/src/pages/Activity2ResilientLea: Implements Activity 2 form workflow for resilient leadership submissions, validation generation, and quote fetching.
frontend/src/pages/BioPage.tsx: Displays author bio, background information, and external profile links.
frontend/src/pages/LeadershipBoardPage.t: Shows leadership word patterns and community micro‑solutions with polling updates.
Renders a page showing learning outcomes sourced from proposalContent with styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/MovieReferencesPage.t: Displays a list of movie references from movieReferences using styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Shows an abstract, full abstract, and quick navigation links using proposalContent data.
frontend/src/pages/ReferencesPage.tsx: Lists academic references from REFERENCES in styled containers.
frontend/src/pages/SessionOutlinePage.ts: Empty placeholder file for a session outline page.
frontend/src/pages/SlidesPage.tsx: Provides access to session slides with a displayed QR code image.
frontend/src/pages/TakeawaysPage.tsx: Displays key takeaways sourced from proposalContent in styled cards.
frontend/src/utils/activity1Affirmations: Generates affirmation messages and selects matching academic references based on leadership word inputs.
frontend/src/utils/activity2Validation.t: Produces validation messages and selects references by detecting themes from user responses.
Maps UI challenge type keys to backend ChallengeType enum values.
frontend/src/utils/isVillainousInput.ts: Detects negative or harmful language using keyword and phrase matching utilities.
frontend/src/utils/quoteFormatting.ts: Formats QuoteGenre enum values into user-friendly franchise names.
frontend/src/utils/referenceSelection.ts: Validates references and provides deterministic or random selection of valid ReferenceEntry objects.
frontend/src/utils/starWarsQuotes.ts: Defines a StarWarsQuote interface, a list of predefined Star Wars quotes, and a deterministic quote selector.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing and retrieving them from sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts unknown errors into user-friendly messages with special handling for actor, validation, network, and backend errors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, plugins, colors, fonts, animations, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, existing features, new feature requests, issues, and architectural notes for anonymous Activity submissions.
